mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (houseCode, houseName, regCode, dongName, jibun, price, year, month, type, userid) VALUES (#{houseCode}, #{houseName},#{regCode},#{dongName},#{jibun},#{price},#{year},#{month},#{type},#{userid})
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where houseCode = #{houseCode} and userid = #{userid}
